format: JavaScript (ES6 Module syntax with LightningJS components)
description: This file defines a UI component 'SidebarFilters' for a recipe application, built with LightningJS. It displays current filter settings for cuisines, difficulties, maximum time, and sorting options, and allows user interaction through remote control inputs to modify these filters dynamically.

classes.name: SidebarFilters
classes.description: A LightningJS component for managing and displaying recipe filter options with remote control interaction, including support for accessibility features.

methods.name: updateFilters
methods.description: Updates the global store with current filter selections based on UI state.

methods.name: updateSort
methods.description: Updates the sorting parameters in the global store based on current selections.
